title: SHOW_OUTLINE_INDICATOR_ON_BLIP
content:
0xB81656BC81FE24D10x8DE82C15// ShowOutlineIndicatorOnBlip
void SHOW_OUTLINE_INDICATOR_ON_BLIP(Blip blip, BOOL toggle);Parameters:blip: The blip to toggle the outline on.toggle: Enables or disables the outline.Toggles a cyan outline around the blip.Color can be changed with SET_BLIP_SECONDARY_COLOUR. Enabling this circle will override the "crew" and "friend" half-circles (see SHOW_CREW_INDICATOR_ON_BLIP and SHOW_FRIEND_INDICATOR_ON_BLIP).Old name:  SET_BLIP_FRIENDLY
codeBlocks:
// ShowOutlineIndicatorOnBlip
void SHOW_OUTLINE_INDICATOR_ON_BLIP(Blip blip, BOOL toggle);

-- Example usage for SHOW_OUTLINE_INDICATOR_ON_BLIP
ShowOutlineIndicatorOnBlip(0, false)
